RetryStrategy RetryStrategy Class

Definition

Namespace:
Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.TransientFaultHandling
Assembly:
Microsoft.Azure.Devices.Client.NetStandard.dll

Represents a retry strategy that determines the number of retry attempts and the interval between retries.

Edit

In this Article

public abstract class RetryStrategyPublic MustInherit Class RetryStrategy
Inheritance
ObjectObject
RetryStrategyRetryStrategy
Derived
ExponentialBackoffExponentialBackoff
FixedIntervalFixedInterval
IncrementalIncremental

MemberwiseClone()MemberwiseClone()
ReferenceEquals(Object, Object)ReferenceEquals(Object, Object)
ToString()ToString()

Constructors

RetryStrategy(String, Boolean) RetryStrategy(String, Boolean)

Edit

Initializes a new instance of the RetryStrategy class. 

protected RetryStrategy(string name, bool firstFastRetry)Protected Sub New(name As String, firstFastRetry As Boolean)
Parameters
name
String String

The name of the retry strategy.

firstFastRetry
Boolean Boolean

true to immediately retry in the first attempt; otherwise, false. The subsequent retries will remain subject to the configured retry interval.

Fields

DefaultClientBackoff DefaultClientBackoff

Edit

Represents the default amount of time used when calculating a random delta in the exponential delay between retries.

public static readonly TimeSpan DefaultClientBackoffPublic Shared ReadOnly DefaultClientBackoff As TimeSpan

DefaultClientRetryCount DefaultClientRetryCount

Edit

Represents the default number of retry attempts.

public static readonly int DefaultClientRetryCountPublic Shared ReadOnly DefaultClientRetryCount As Integer

DefaultFirstFastRetry DefaultFirstFastRetry

Edit

Represents the default flag indicating whether the first retry attempt will be made immediately, whereas subsequent retries will remain subject to the retry interval.

public static readonly bool DefaultFirstFastRetryPublic Shared ReadOnly DefaultFirstFastRetry As Boolean

DefaultMaxBackoff DefaultMaxBackoff

Edit

Represents the default maximum amount of time used when calculating the exponential delay between retries.

public static readonly TimeSpan DefaultMaxBackoffPublic Shared ReadOnly DefaultMaxBackoff As TimeSpan

DefaultMinBackoff DefaultMinBackoff

Edit

Represents the default minimum amount of time used when calculating the exponential delay between retries.

public static readonly TimeSpan DefaultMinBackoffPublic Shared ReadOnly DefaultMinBackoff As TimeSpan

DefaultRetryIncrement DefaultRetryIncrement

Edit

Represents the default time increment between retry attempts in the progressive delay policy.

public static readonly TimeSpan DefaultRetryIncrementPublic Shared ReadOnly DefaultRetryIncrement As TimeSpan

DefaultRetryInterval DefaultRetryInterval

Edit

Represents the default interval between retries.

public static readonly TimeSpan DefaultRetryIntervalPublic Shared ReadOnly DefaultRetryInterval As TimeSpan

Properties

DefaultExponential DefaultExponential

Edit

Returns a default policy that implements a random exponential retry interval configured with the DefaultClientRetryCount, DefaultMinBackoff, DefaultMaxBackoff, and DefaultClientBackoff parameters. The default retry policy treats all caught exceptions as transient errors.

public static RetryStrategy DefaultExponential { get; }Public Shared ReadOnly Property DefaultExponential As RetryStrategy
Value
RetryStrategy RetryStrategy

DefaultFixed DefaultFixed

Edit

Returns a default policy that implements a fixed retry interval configured with the DefaultClientRetryCount and DefaultRetryInterval parameters. The default retry policy treats all caught exceptions as transient errors.

public static RetryStrategy DefaultFixed { get; }Public Shared ReadOnly Property DefaultFixed As RetryStrategy
Value
RetryStrategy RetryStrategy

DefaultProgressive DefaultProgressive

Edit

Returns a default policy that implements a progressive retry interval configured with the DefaultClientRetryCount, DefaultRetryInterval, and DefaultRetryIncrement parameters. The default retry policy treats all caught exceptions as transient errors.

public static RetryStrategy DefaultProgressive { get; }Public Shared ReadOnly Property DefaultProgressive As RetryStrategy
Value
RetryStrategy RetryStrategy

FastFirstRetry FastFirstRetry

Edit

Gets or sets a value indicating whether the first retry attempt will be made immediately, whereas subsequent retries will remain subject to the retry interval.

public bool FastFirstRetry { get; set; }Public Property FastFirstRetry As Boolean
Value
Boolean Boolean

Name Name

Edit

Gets the name of the retry strategy.

public string Name { get; }Public ReadOnly Property Name As String
Value
String String

NoRetry NoRetry

Edit

Returns a default policy that performs no retries, but invokes the action only once.

public static RetryStrategy NoRetry { get; }Public Shared ReadOnly Property NoRetry As RetryStrategy
Value
RetryStrategy RetryStrategy

Methods

GetShouldRetry() GetShouldRetry()

Edit

Returns the corresponding ShouldRetry delegate.

public abstract ShouldRetry GetShouldRetry()Public MustOverride Function GetShouldRetry As ShouldRetry
Returns
ShouldRetry ShouldRetry

The ShouldRetry delegate.
